SECTION_CONTENT:
Eye Contact
Rinse immediately with plenty of water, also under the eyelids, for at least 15 minutes.
Obtain medical attention.
Skin Contact
Wash off immediately with plenty of water for at least 15 minutes. Obtain medical attention.
Inhalation
Remove from exposure, lie down. Move to fresh air. If breathing is difficult, give oxygen. If
not breathing, give artificial respiration.
Ingestion
Do not induce vomiting. Get medical attention.
Most important symptoms/effects
No information available.
Notes to Physician
Treat symptomatically
